author: Joe Brennan
title: Coronavirus: Insurers told to interpret claims in customers’ favour
description: The Central Bank has told insurance chief executives in the State they must take personal responsibility for the oversight of how claims relating to Covid-19 are handled by their firms, and to interpret policies in favour of customers where there is doubt. “A…
content:
The Central Bank has told insurance chief executives in the State they must take personal responsibility for the oversight of how claims relating to Covid-19 are handled by their firms, and to interpret policies in favour of customers where there is doubt.
